title: Heath's Bold Predictions! Swift, Dak and Andrews (06/02 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Heath thinks D'Andre Swift will be the best Lions RB in a long time, Dak Prescott could break a record and Mark Andrews could be TE1. Before we get to that, we go over some NFL news as Ben Roethlisberger gives some clarification on his elbow ... D'Andre Swift Top 5!? Find out why Heath is so excited and what might go wrong for Swift this season (6:24). Then we spend some time on Dak Prescott (15:15). Was he really so great last season, or did he just throw the ball a ridiculous amount of times? That may not matter because there are plenty of reasons to like Dak in 2021 ... Mark Andrews has the talent and the efficiency to be TE1 this season (23:30), but we have to consider the Ravens passing game and perhaps some target competition as well ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
